title: Lost 4 H-bombs!
subject_group: Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/United States - Armed forces
Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Hydrogen bomb
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Village communities - Spain

Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Environmental health
description: On the 17th January, 1966, a plane of the United States Air Force lost four hydrogen bombs near the fishing village of Palomares, in southern Spain. Tells of the subsequent search of the bombs, their recovery, and the impact of this nuclear accident on the people involved: the villagers, a general of the Spanish Air Ministry, the Duchess of Medina Sidonia and American personnel.
